casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 29, 2016. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of February 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of February 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 30th day of March 2016 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12.
